eventName: Come Catastrophes or Wakes of Vultures
storyInfo: Jessica follows the hunter to the diner, where she learns that the target for her special mission is none other than the hunter himself. After the team arrives at the plate, Liskarm discovers that the local government is actually under the control of the bank.

attributes.content: Brrr... Helena, ain't it way too cold in here today?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Almost out of charcoal. Have to save some for later.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Just burn that mountain of bills piling up at my place. The bank's just gonna send more anyhow.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: *cough*
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Did you catch a cold? C'mon, let's swing around to my place and grab a stack of that waste paper.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: (*whispers*) Why do you think I'm coughing? Not in front of her...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Oh, if it ain't Sylvia!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: G-Good morning, Mr. Theremin...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: What brings someone from the bank out here to our shabby little establishment? Something wrong?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: S-Sorry...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... Leone, I ain't seen Benny in a while. What's the kid been up to?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Busy with his studies. Got his nose in a book till dawn every night.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Didn't the school close down a while ago?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Our neighbor, Ms. Selena, used to be a schoolteacher. She reckoned it'd be a real shame for Benny to miss out on all that book learning, so she's been letting him study at her place.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Huh, good for him. Benny's always been a smart kid, and he was real shook when he learned he wouldn't be able to go to school no more.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Yeah. He was so anxious that whole year.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: M-Mr. Theremin, actually, I... I could teach Benny too...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Oh right, you graduated from the best business school in Columbia—
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: And what's he supposed to learn from you? How to become a banker so he can bury people in bills too when he grows up?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Leone, eat your damn breakfast before it freezes over!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hmph!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I-I need to get to work, so I'll be leaving now... I'll leave the money on the table.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: You know she ain't responsible for any of the loans here in Davistown, right? What're you giving her lip for?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Then let her have a heart-to-heart with the others. They'll be even harsher, I guarantee it.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: But still, we watched her grow up...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: That's exactly why! Pisses me off even more!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Sorry to keep you waiting, ma'am. I hope we're not too late.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Oh... H-Hello. It's fine, you're not late at all.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: What would you like me to call you?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You can call me, uh...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Achoo—!
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: How long have you been standing here, ma'am?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Since... this morning. The message only said you'd be arriving today, but not the specific time.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: But it's already afternoon. You've been standing here this whole time?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Three hours ago we sent a notification to the plate, updating them on our ETA.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...I-I didn't get anything of the sort.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: That's weird. Who sent you?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Um... the manager.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Manager? That's not a title I'm used to hearing in government work.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Actually, I... I'm not from the government. I work for a local bank.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Since when is a bank in charge of this?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Actually... Um, actually, Davistown is...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: We're here, Captain Liskarm. Is this woman the one in charge of our reception?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Wait, Sylvia? They sent you out here for this?
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Th-That's right, sir.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Hey, old man, any idea why the government sent a banker to pick us up instead?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: *sigh*... You'd best ask the bank directly. I sure ain't gonna be able to explain all the twists and turns.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Alright then. Franka, go ahead and take the gentleman home. And while you're at it, take a walk around Davistown to get a better grasp of the situation here.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...Understood.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Laura, bring the others with you and find a good place for a safe house where we can securely stow our supplies and vehicles. If you manage to get a hold of Jessica, report it to me right away.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Sylvia and I will head to the bank... to find out what exactly is going on here.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: That's our teacher's pet for you. Thanks for volunteering for the hard part.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Where should we regroup once we're all finished?
attributes.name: Laura

attributes.content: Y'all can meet up at the only diner still open in town. It's right by the only road to the mine. Run by a real nice lady named Helena.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: And if this Jessica of yours finds her way into town, I reckon that's where she'll end up too.
attributes.name: Miles

attributes.content: Mm... It's decided, then.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The bank is right up ahead, Miss...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: People have been avoiding us the whole way here... Had I known, I'd have asked Franka to take my equipment back with her first.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: N-No, that's not why...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Oof...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You asshole, you run into someone and don't even apologize?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: It's over...
attributes.name: Pale Man

attributes.content: Sir? Are you okay?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: ...It's all over.
attributes.name: Pale Man

attributes.content: Sir? Sir! What happened?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: What's going on... He looks like his soul has left his body. Where's he going?
attributes.name: Blacksteel Mercenary

attributes.content: Do you recognize him, Sylvia?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No, I... umm...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Let's, um... h-head to the bank first.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: ...Along with the rapid development of pioneer settlements, nomadic plates both large and small have also been springing up.
attributes.name: Advertising Board

attributes.content: But at the time, very few financial institutions in Columbia were specialized in pioneering.
attributes.name: Advertising Board

attributes.content: ...After looking deeply into the living conditions of the countless pioneers on the frontier's edge, our founder decided to plant his roots alongside them and established the first bank to provide practical financial support to the lower and middle classes.
attributes.name: Advertising Board

attributes.content: He prided himself in building trust, showing kindness, and doing his best to provide attentive service to everyone who walked through his doors in the rough-and-tumble frontier.
attributes.name: Advertising Board

attributes.content: It wasn't long before his hard work and empathy won him wide recognition.
attributes.name: Advertising Board

attributes.content: Then, we began forming close and fruitful partnerships with local governments, working together with mining and pioneering companies to help them flourish and expand rapidly into settlements just like Davistown.
attributes.name: Advertising Board

attributes.content: Quite the legend, wouldn't you agree?
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: And who might you be...?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Sorry for keeping you waiting, Miss Liskarm. I am this bank's manager. My sincerest apologies for not being able to welcome you in person earlier.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: We are aware of the problems facing Davistown. A few inconveniences are to be expected. However...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No need to be reserved. Feel free speak your mind.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: We were planning to liaison with the local government, not a bank. What exactly happened to the government here?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Sylvia, did you not explain the situation?
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Manager, I...
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Sylvia stood alone in the cold for the better part of the day. If you ask me, what she needs right now is hot water and a blanket.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Of course. Sylvia, take half a day off to go home and get some rest.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Okay... I'll see you later then, Miss.
attributes.name: Sylvia

attributes.content: Oh, Sylv—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Miss Liskarm, if there's anything else you need, please let me know. Resources are scarce on this plate, but we will do everything in our power to accommodate you.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: I appreciate the sentiment, but please don't try to change the subject.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Why is it that Blacksteel's client was the local government, but we're being greeted by your bank's employees? Where are the heads of the local government agencies?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Please come with me.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Are you telling me that your government officials are in the bank's garage?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: During last year's bankruptcy liquidation, the local government cut most of their departments and laid off most of their employees. But that wasn't enough to pay off the massive debts they still held. In the end, the remaining government buildings were put up for auction as well.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: What about the mayor, then? Where is he?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Unfortunately, after the last mayor ran off with hardly a penny to his name, the townsfolk never found a suitable candidate to replace him.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: As you can see, all that remains today is... the mayor's secretary, and a few temporary employees.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Ha... Haha, it's okay. If the bank hadn't generously provided us with free office space, we'd be out on the streets.
attributes.name: Mayor's Secretary

attributes.content: It's just the right thing to do. Besides, it's nothing compared to what you've been through.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Seeing as the government is still functioning, can we—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Mayor's Secretary

attributes.content: I mean, as much as we'd like to help you, we simply don't have the manpower to support your work.
attributes.name: Mayor's Secretary

attributes.content: ...Then, who's in charge of matters concerning our job here?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We've given full authority over that to the woman standing next to you. Go to her for anything you might need.
attributes.name: Mayor's Secretary

attributes.content: Absolutely. My door is always open.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: ...I certainly hope you can issue a formal document showing this authorization.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Mr. Secretary, when can she expect that document?
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: I'll have it ready right away! The official seal somehow went missing yesterday, so I've sent someone to go look for it!
attributes.name: Mayor's Secretary

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Now then... I'm very much looking forward to a mutually beneficial partnership.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: I'll show you to my office. Try not to dawdle, as we have many things to discuss before our work begins in earnest.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Wait, just a moment, ma'am!
attributes.name: Mayor's Secretary

attributes.content: What is it now?
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Um, well... It's been way too cold in here recently. W-Would you mind turning up the heat in the garage a smidge? Everyone's freezing down here.
attributes.name: Mayor's Secretary

attributes.content: ...Of course. I'll always do my best to accommodate your needs.
attributes.name: Bank Manager

attributes.content: Have you and your teammates decided on a rendezvous point?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Um... N-Not yet. B-But, it'll be fine. I'll find somewhere to wait for them on my own...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Achoo!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: There's a diner in Davistown. Wait in there.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Wh-Where is it? Oh, um, you don't need to take me there. General directions should be fine...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Forget it, just come with me.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Huh? Is he.... one of the plate's residents?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That man... Why doesn't he have anything with him?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Excuse me! Sir! Where are you going?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hello? Are you leaving the plate? It's not safe out here!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Over here! I'm talking to you! Look, over here! Can you hear me?!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Sir? Sir!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: The man doesn't respond to Jessica's calls, and simply continues shuffling towards the snow in silence.
In front of him, the vast white stretches far into the distance, blending into the dark, ashen sky.
From Jessica's perspective, the vast snowfield gradually squeezes the man into a pale blue line. After a short while, he shrinks into a small dot, then finally disappears into the white.
Nothing remains to prove he was even there, save for the tracks he left behind.
Are you coming or not?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: I... I'll be right there!
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: I'm back, Helena.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Woody? About time!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Wait... Where's Miles?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: He was rescued by this girl's friends.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Um, and who are you?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I'm, umm...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: ...She's a merc I met on the way. Her communicator broke, and she got separated from her teammates. So I brought her into town to wait for them.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Mind if I take a look at the communicator? Might be able to fix it up for you.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: H-Here... Sorry to bother you like this.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No problem. You guys saved Miles, so what's a little communicator between friends?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: That said, why come here of all places?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: ...We received a commission from the local government to help Davistown restore its power facilities and get the plate back onto its navigation route.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Hold on, girl, could you repeat that? Restore our power facilities? You ain't pulling my leg, are you?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: You should see the goofy grin on your face.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Young lady, regardless of why you and your companions are here, thank you so much for rescuing Miles... I've been so worried I ain't slept a wink in days.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Alright... All's well that ends well? Then, got anything to eat?
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Didn't have nothing ready, but looks like you brought something back for me.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Oh, right.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: A mother beast?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Sorry... It was my fault...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No use fretting over something like that, this time of year. Nothing beats meat.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Fair enough... Okay, you two, sit your butts down and grab something to drink. I'll prepare the meat—
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Hey, why're you getting up to leave? Weren't you gonna eat?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Change of plans.
attributes.name: Seasoned Hunter

attributes.content: Sir... How badly damaged is the communicator?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Nothing serious. C'mon, let's go take a look around my warehouse. Might be some spare parts we can use—
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Stop tinkering for a second and give this a try.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Deep-fried? Now this is the good stuff!
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: But... this definitely ain't enough for everyone.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: If you're worried about that, then stop scarfing it all down! The poor girl still ain't had a piece!
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: It's totally fine. He helped me fix my communicator, so... he deserves to eat his fill.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: That barely counts for anything. It's so cold round these parts, we all gotta help each other out, just to get by. Give us a holler if you ever need anything.
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Thank you. I appreciate it, ma'am.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: By the way, I happened to see someone a ways out from the plate. He wasn't carrying anything, and wouldn't respond when I called out to him... He just kept walking deeper and deeper into the snow, until I couldn't see him anymore...
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Did something happen to him?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: You're a guest here, young lady. Don't worry your pretty little head over stuff like that and just fill your tummy first, okay?
attributes.name: Helena

attributes.content: Then... would you mind if I asked you two about someone else?
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: *sigh*... Kids these days. Barely stepped on the plate, and already so many questions. Alright, fine, ask away.
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: I wanted to know about a man named Woodrow Bianchi—
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: Who...?
attributes.name: Helena and Leone

attributes.content: Sorry, I guess you're not familiar with him. I'll try asking someone else.
attributes.name: Jessica

attributes.content: No, that ain't the problem... You sure you're not confused?
attributes.name: Leone

attributes.content: Woodrow's the man who brought you here, though?
attributes.name: Helena
